trans-unit.source: Defines the base class for classes in the <see cref="N:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar" /> namespace that correspond to the elements in an SRGS grammar.
trans-unit.target: Define a classe base para classes no namespace <see cref="N:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar" /> correspondentes aos elementos em uma gramática SRGS.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsElement> class is the base class for the following classes, which correspond to elements defined in the [Speech Recognition Grammar Specification (SRGS) Version 1.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201761):
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsElement> classe é a classe base para as seguintes classes, que correspondem aos elementos definidos a [especificação de gramática de reconhecimento de fala (SRGS) versão 1.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201761):

trans-unit.source: Two additional classes inherit from <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsElement> and represent the text contained within the classes listed above (SrgsText), and recognition matching modes (SrgsSubset):
trans-unit.target: Herdam de duas classes adicionais de <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsElement> e representar o texto contido dentro de classes listadas acima (SrgsText) e o reconhecimento de correspondência de modos (SrgsSubset):

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsElement" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsElement" />.
